# Tender Details

## Solicitation Number
WS4302279238

## Tender Closing Date
2024-01-19 at 14:00 EST

## Amendment Date
2023-12-13

## Contract Details
- **Contract Start Date**: None
- **Contract End Date**: 2028-03-31

## Tender Status
Cancelled

## Procurement Details
- **Procurement Category**: GD
- **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
- **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

## Trade Agreements
This tender is opened to the following trade agreements:
- **Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)**
- **Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)**
- **World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)**
- **Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)**
- **Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement**
- **Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)**
- **Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement**
- **Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)**
- **Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)**
- **Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement**
- **Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)**
- **Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)**

## Regions of Operation and Delivery
- **Saskatoon**

## Contact Information
**Name:** Luke Cao (SPAC/PSPC)
**Email:** luke.cao@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
**Phone:** (no available information)
**Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

## Tender Description
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) has a requirement for the supply and delivery of liquid nitrogen tanks to the Animal Genetic Resources of Canada at the Saskatoon Research and Development Centre (SRDC) on an "if and when required" basis to meet the current and future operational requirements for the facility.

Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2024-01-19
